bookmark.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a piece of paper, leather etc that you put in a book to show you the last page you have read
bookmark.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a way of saving the address of a page on the Internet so that you can find it again
bookmark.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to save the address of a page on the Internet so that you can find it again easily
bookmark.translation[2].definitions[0].d: a way of saving something such as the address of a WEBSITE or the place in a computer file, so that you can return to it more easily
bookmark.translation[2].definitions[0].e: The bookmark function allows users to resume from the point where they left by electronically ‘marking’ it before switching the unit off.
